```{r}
library(tidyverse)
require(tidytext)
require(textstem)
require(rvest)
require(qdapRegex)
require(stopwords)
require(tokenizers)
library(tidymodels)
library(modelr)
library(Matrix)
library(sparsesvd)
library(glmnet)
# function to parse html and clean text
parse_fn <- function(.html){
  read_html(.html) %>%
    html_elements('p, h1, h2, h3 , h4, h5, h6') %>%
    html_text2() %>%
    str_c(collapse = ' ') %>%
    rm_url() %>%
    rm_email() %>%
    str_remove_all('\'') %>%
    str_replace_all(paste(c('\n', 
                            '[[:punct:]]', 
                            'nbsp', 
                            '[[:digit:]]', 
                            '[[:symbol:]]'),
                          collapse = '|'), ' ') %>%
    str_replace_all("([a-z])([A-Z])", "\\1 \\2") %>%
    tolower() %>%
    str_replace_all("\\s+", " ")
}

# function to apply to claims data
parse_data <- function(.df){
  out <- .df %>%
    filter(str_detect(text_tmp, '<!')) %>%
    rowwise() %>%
    mutate(text_clean = parse_fn(text_tmp)) %>%
    unnest(text_clean) 
  return(out)
}


```

```{r}
claims_clean_headers <- claims_raw %>%
  parse_data()
```
